answers.answer: you might find more help on a Type 2 forum.

question: my  wife who has type 2 diabetes is undergoing dialysis 3 times a week, She does not have the strength to stand up and walk and she complaint not having no stamina and she get dizzy every time she gets back from dialysis.I have to  put her in a wheelchair from the car to the house.She has not been able to walk upstair to the bedroom and she has been grounded to the couch downstair since.Could you please help?If you need more additional info please let me knowthank you
title: my wife has no strength to walk
